overview.heading: Edmonton Virtual Office
overview.body: Thinking about an Edmonton address to get your startup going or boost your existing business, but concerned about the expense of a full-time office? Opus VO is your answer. You can list your business at one of our select Edmonton locations, enjoying a reputable address without the financial stress. And when it’s time to have important meetings or client conversations, our top-of-the-line conference rooms are available for you.  But a great address is just the beginning. When you choose a virtual office with Opus VO in Edmonton, you also get access to a live receptionist. Our dedicated team will handle your customer communications and manage routine tasks like digital mail sorting and call direction. This leaves you free to concentrate on expanding your business.

faqs.question: Can I receive mail under my company name and personal name?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can receive mail under both once your account has been activated.

faqs.question: Do you use an automated phone service or a receptionist to answer?
faqs.answer: We offer a live, personalized receptionist to transfer your calls during business hours Monday to Friday. Calls made after hours will be met with a professional voicemail.

faqs.question: Can I have a virtual office in Edmonton, Alberta even if I don’t reside there?
faqs.answer: Yes, and it is a fantastic way to expand your presence to new clients. It will build trust with residents by having your business in the heart of Edmonton. You can also adapt to better meet your clients’ unique needs within Alberta.

faqs.question: What do you mean by “all-inclusive services”?
faqs.answer: Our Edmonton virtual office offerings include all features listed at the same monthly cost, regardless of the location you choose. Please note that mail centers and some premium locations may not include all options. If you would like additional information, you can compare Opus to our competitors or contact us.

sections.title: Why Edmonton? Why Opus VO?
sections.body: Edmonton is not just a vibrant city; it’s a dynamic place for business with a lot of opportunities across various sectors. When you set up your virtual office with Opus VO in Edmonton, you’re stepping into a thriving professional scene, ripe with potential for growth and partnerships.  Opting for Opus VO in Edmonton is more than just a way to save money; it’s a smart decision that can put your business on track for greater accomplishments. Your next big business move could be just a virtual office choice away.  Opus VO Location in Edmonton @ 10060 Jasper Avenue Tower 1, Edmonton, AB T5J
